short_bio: Software Engineer specializing in scalable data/AI pipelines, backend development (Python, FastAPI), MLOps (AWS, Docker, CI/CD), and end-to-end AI agent/RAG system development.

current_job.company: Sonar Instruments and Technology Pvt Ltd

current_job.description: Engineered an end-to-end IoT monitoring and predictive maintenance platform on AWS. Built data pipelines (MQTT, IoT Core, FastAPI) processing 20K+ daily events. top_projects.name: End-to-End ML Pipeline for Scrap Material Classification
top_projects.description: Built a complete MLOps pipeline using PyTorch (ResNet18) to classify scrap materials from the TrashNet dataset. top_projects.name: Financial Document Q&A Assistant (RAG Pipeline)

Architected a local-first Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) backend with LangChain, Ollama (Mistral, nomic-embed-text), and FAISS to enable natural language Q&A, reducing manual data analysis time by over 80%.

top_projects.name: AI Task Planning Agent
top_projects.description: Built an intelligent agent that transforms natural language goals into actionable, step-by-step plans. The system integrates multiple LLM providers (Ollama, OpenRouter, Gemini) and external tools (Web Search, Weather API) for data enrichment, with a Streamlit UI and SQLite persistence.

top_projects.name: Voice Data AI/ML Project (Emotion/Speaker ID)
top_projects.description: A full-stack audio ML pipeline using librosa for feature extraction (MFCC, spectrograms) and TensorFlow/PyTorch for model training (CNNs, RNNs) on the RAVDESS dataset. The system is served via a FastAPI backend and includes a Streamlit app for real-time recording and prediction.

top_projects.name: Telegram Job Scraper Bot
top_projects.description: Automated job scraping from Telegram groups using Telethon. The system uses an LLM (via OpenRouter) to parse job details, stores data in SQLite, syncs to Google Sheets (gspread), and is monitored by a Flask web dashboard. Deployed on Render.

top_projects.name: Bitcoin Sentiment & Trader Performance Analysis
